constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 37 (Friday, February 26, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. PLASKETT:
H.R. 1423.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article IV, Section 3 of the United States Constitution.
[Page H859]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

title: To amend title 1, United States Code, to provide for a definition of the term "State" and to include territories therein, and for other purposes.
